data.oai_dc:dc: The database of Collembola includes information about specimens which are preserved in the Zoological Collection MIZ. Material was collected during faunistic and ecological researches in the river valleys: the Biebrza, the Narew, the Warta and the Wisła Rivers. The material is identified to the species level. The data were verified by doctor Maria Sterzyńska.|3,918 occurrences
